::: {.panel-tabset}

## R

```{r, message=FALSE}

library(dplyr)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)

set.seed(123)

p <- babynames %>% 
  filter(year %in% c(1900, 1905, 1910), between(n, 1500, 8000)) %>%
  arrange(name, year) %>% 
  slice_head(n = 30) %>% 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = n,
      y = fct_reorder(name,n, .fun="sum"),
      fill = factor(
        year,
        levels = c(1910, 1905, 1900)
      )
    )
  ) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(
    title = "Bar Chart of Names by Year",
    x = "Count",
    y = "Name",
    fill = "year"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
p

```
